data.title: Lord of Light

data.meta_description: Books by Roger Zelazny Lord of Light 9780575094215 Gateway  9780575094215
data.text:
Imagine a distant world where gods walk as men, but wield vast and hidden powers. Here they have made the stage on which they build a subtle pattern of alliance, love, and deadly enmity. Are they truly immortal? Who are these gods who rule the destiny of a teeming world?

Their names include Brahma, Kali, Krishna and also he who was called Buddha, the Lord of Light, but who now prefers to be known simply as Sam. The gradual unfolding of the story - how the colonization of another planet became a re-enactment of Eastern mythology - is one ... Read moreof the great imaginative feats of modern science fiction.

Winner of the Hugo Award for best novel, 1968.

Show Less
